xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya » Avigataduka
Tika
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Avigataduka
Tika
352Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
353(Yathā hetumūlakaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
Anulomapaccanīyagaṇanā.
<< Avigatadukaup2.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
